quote: Word has reached my ears of this Aragorn, son of Arathorn, and I tell you now, I will not BOW to this Ranger from the North, last of a ragged house long bereft of lordship!
author: Denethor Son of Ecthelion

quote: Is there a captain here who still has the courage to do his lord's will?
author: Denethor Son of Ecthelion

quote: My sons are spent. My line has ended. Rohan has deserted us. Theoden's betrayed me. ABANDON YOUR POSTS! FLEEEEE, FLEE FOR YOUR LIVES!
author: Denethor Son of Ecthelion

quote: A new POWER is rising. Its victory is at HAND. This night the land will be stained with the blood of ROHAN. MARCH to Helm's Deep. Leave NONE alive. To WAR!
author: Saruman the White (Curunír)

quote: Whom do you serve?
author: Saruman the White (Curunír)

quote: I gave you the chance of aiding me willingly, but you have elected the way of PAIN!
author: Saruman the White (Curunír)

quote: So GANDALF, you try to lead them over Caradhras. And if that fails, where then will you go? If the mountain defeats you, will you risk a more dangerous road?
author: Saruman the White (Curunír)

quote: Cuiva nwalca Carnirasse! Nai Yarvaxea Rasselya! Taltuva Notto Carinnar!
author: Saruman the White (Curunír)

quote: What do you want, GANDALF GREYHAME? Let me guess - the Key of Orthanc? Or perhaps the keys of Barad-dûr itself, along with the crowns of the Seven Kings and the rods of the Five Wizards!
author: Saruman the White (Curunír)

quote: ‘A Man of Rohan’? What is the House of Rohan, but a THATCHED BARN, where brigards drink in the reek, and their brats roll on the floor WITH THE DOGS?! The victory at Helm's Deep does not belong to you, Théoden HORSE-MASTER! You are a lesser son of greater sires!
author: Saruman the White (Curunír)

quote: Who knows what you have spoken to the darkness, alone, in the bitter watches of the night, when all your life seems to shrink, the walls of your BOWER closing in about you, a hutch to trammel some... WILD THING.
author: Grima Wormtongue

quote: The staff! I TOLD YOU TO TAKE THE WIZARD'S STAFF!
author: Grima Wormtongue

quote: A just question my liege. Late is the hour in which this conjurer chooses to appear! Lathspell I name you. Ill news is an ill guest.
author: Grima Wormtongue

quote: Let the laird of the Black land cam forth!
author: Aragorn (Strider)

quote: We must get off the MOUNTAIN! Make for the gap of ROHAN! Or take the west road to MY CITY!
author: Boromir, son of Denethor

quote: Gondor has no king. Gondor needs no king.
author: Boromir, son of Denethor

quote: Is it not a strange fate that we should suffer so much fear and doubt for so small a thing?
author: Boromir, son of Denethor

quote: The shards of Narsil...  The blade that cut the Ring from Sauron's hand... Ah! Its still sharp... but no more than a broken heirloom.
author: Boromir, son of Denethor

quote: Your leechcraft would have had me crawling on all fours like a beast!
author: Theoden, son of Thengel

quote: Arise, arise, Riders of Théoden! spear shall be shaken, shield shall be splintered, a sword-day, a red day, ere the sun RISES! ... Ride, ride to RUIN and the WORLD'S ENDING!
author: Theoden, son of Thengel

quote: We shall have peace. We shall have peace, when you answer for the burning of the Westfold, and the children that lie dead there! We shall have peace, when the lives of the soldiers, whose bodies were hewn even as they lay dead against the Gates of the Hornburg, are avenged! When you hang from a gibbet, for the sport of your own crows, we shall have peace!
author: Theoden, son of Thengel

quote: Be silent! Keep your forked tongue behind your teeth! I have not passed through fire and death to bandy crooked words with a witless worm.
author: Gandalf the White (Mithrandir)

quote: I am the Servant of the Secret Fire! Wielder of the Flame of Anor! The dark FIRE shall not AVAIL you, FLAME OF UNDUN! Go back to the Shadow! YOU...SHALL NOT...PASS!
author: Gandalf the Grey (Mithrandir)

quote: BILBO BAGGINS. Do not take me for some conjuror of CHEAP TRICKS. I am not trying to rob you, I'm trying to help you.
author: Gandalf the Grey (Mithrandir)

quote: Salted pork?
author: Gimli, Son of Gloin

quote: Let us go through the mines of Moria. My cousin Balin will give us a ROYAL WELCOME.
author: Gimli, Son of Gloin

quote: I will be dead before I see the Ring in the hands of an elf!
author: Gimli, Son of Gloin

quote: Lovely big GOLDEN chips with a nice piece of fried fish.
author: Samwise Gamgee, son of Hamfast (the ‘Gaffer’)

quote: PO-TA-TOES!? Mash 'em, boil 'em, stick 'em in a stew? ... You're 'opeless.
author: Samwise Gamgee, son of Hamfast (the ‘Gaffer’)

quote: I don't know half of you half as well as I should like; and I like less than half of you half as well as you deserve.
author: Bilbo Baggins

quote: No, thank you! We don't want any more visitors, well-wishers or distant relations!
author: Bilbo Baggins

quote: I thought up an ending for my book: 'And he lived happily ever after, unto the end of his days.'
author: Bilbo Baggins
